titleStmt.title: A full ansvver to a printed paper, entituled, Foure serious questions concerning excommunication, and suspension from the sacrament, &c. Wherein the severall arguments and texts of scripture produced, are particularly and distinctly discussed: and the debarring of ignorant and scandalous persons from the sacrament vindicated.
titleStmt.author: Palmer, Herbert, 1601-1647.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Herbert Palmer by Wing.
A reply to: Prynne, William. Foure serious questions of grand importance, concerning excommunication, and suspention from the Sacrament.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "By Mr Herbert Palmer"; "7bre 18th" [i.e. September 18th].
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
